thread.title: Mr. India Mukesh Singh inks deal with Fitline
thread.title_full: Mr. India Mukesh Singh inks deal with Fitline - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Mr. India Mukesh Singh inks deal with Fitline
text:
NEW DELHI: Four-time Mr. India Mukesh Singh, the rising star of Dronacharya The Gym and student of its founder Dronacharya Bhupender Dhawan, has been appointed as the brand ambassador of famous Indian company 'Fitline'.
Directors of 'Fitline' Harmeet Singh and Puneet Nindra said that the company has signed a two-year agreement with the country's leading bodybuilder Mukesh. The company along with Mukesh will promote the gym equipments and accessories across the country.
Fitline is one of the largest importers of international quality gym and health equipments. Majority of gyms and health centres in various states of India are finely equipped with health equipments of Fitline.
Mukesh is Asia Silver Medalist in bodybuilding, South Asia Gold Medalist in bodybuilding, World Champion in Powerlifting and 2-time European Champion in Powerlifting.
